participant_1.background:
I'm a busy person with a lot of demands on my time.
i ride a motorcycle , but its not a harley.
I remember when I was a little girl, I would dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
i cook every night.
My most prized possession is my comfy couch, where I can relax and enjoy a bowl of pistachio ice cream.

participant_2.background:
Music is my way to relax and enjoy my time with friends.
i sing in the shower.
i get paid over 5 million a year to dribble a ball.
my wife is a college professor.
regular life disappoints me.

content.text: I'm a busy person with a lot of demands on my time.  What's your favorite way to relax?
Music is my way to relax and enjoy my time with friends.
I love to dance to my favorite music.  Do you have a favorite dance you like to do?
I like to dance around in my living room to the music of my favorite ballets.
That sounds lovely!  I used to do that as a child.  I love the way it makes me feel.
I'm glad you enjoy dancing.  It's a great way to express yourself and have fun.
It is!  I wish I had more time to do it.  I'm so busy with my job and other commitments.
I understand.  My job is also very demanding.  But I make sure to take time for myself to relax and enjoy my hobbies.
That's a good idea.  I need to do a better job of that.
You should!  It will make you a happier person.
I think you're right.  I'm going to make an effort to do that more often.
That's great!  I'm sure you'll be glad you did.
